feed.title: SAP Community - PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance
feed.subtitle: PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (Maintenance Management), operation relationships restiction...
entry.content:
In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (Maintenance Management), we have created operation relationships (Finish-to-Start) between maintenance order operations. However, the system still allows confirmation of the subsequent operation even though the predecessor operation is not yet confirmed.

We would like to understand whether this is standard system behavior or if any configuration exists to prevent confirmation of dependent operations until the previous ones are completed.

Example:
- Operation 0010 → Operation 0020 (FS relationship)
- Operation 0010 not confirmed
- Still able to confirm 0020

Expected behavior: 0020 confirmation should be restricted until 0010 is completed.

Kindly clarify or share SAP Note/KBA related to this behavior.

entry.title: Data Migration Cockpit error for Functional Location BOM
entry.content:
Hi All , 

System is allowing to create functional location bom using same functional location and same material code manually but  raising error message when trying to upload using data migration cockpit . The error message is that "Material does not exist or material is not activated " . However , when checking at t-code MM02 or MM03 , material exist . Has anyone faced this issue & how it was fixed ?

BR

Mohammed

entry.title: EAM Proactive Maintenance order cannot be found in Manage Maintenance Notifications and Orders(F4604
entry.content:
Hi,

We are working on the implementation of the S4 Hana Pulbic Colud - 2508.

After I created a proactive maintenance request by using Schedule Maintenance Plan (IP10), I can find the maintenance request in My maintenance request app and Phase is Screening, Subphase is Submitted (Request).

I want to create a proactive maintenance order by using this proactive maintenance request, and I cannot find the request when using Manage Maintenance Notifications and Orders (F4604).

I look into manual and find that there is one more step as Screen Maintenance Requests (F4072), and I also cannot find this app.

Please kindly advise.

Thank you and best regards.

Gao

entry.title: Services for Objects not working properly from Fiori tile;
entry.content:
Hello Team,

In fiori, when trying to open Services for Object we have to click and wait for it to open.

Most of the time you think you didn't click on it so you keep clicking on the button until it opens and closes as many times as you clicked on the button.

Basis team already confirmed that there are no logs related to it in last 30 days.

Is it due to any performance issue ? could you please check and let us know.

In Transaction OMD9 will it have any impact on the existing material masters or material masters created in the future if we change the procurement type from E to F.

entry.title: spare parts
entry.content: "How can I find out in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud how many maintenance plans (or maintenance items) a specific material (for example, material SP011) is assigned to? Is there a standard report or Fiori app that lists all maintenance plans that include a given material as a component? Any tips for navigation or queries would be appreciated

entry.title: Cancel maintenance confirmation to an order with several confirmations in cloud public edition 2508
entry.content:
Hello all,

I found an issue in transaction IW45 in S4Hana cloud public edition selecting an order with several confirmations.

There is no issue when the order has one confirmation and you indicate the order number in the selection screen. But, when you select an order with multiple confirmations, they are displayed in the screen as a list with some details but I haven't found the way to select the one you want to cancel. You can mark de confirmation to cancel using the radio button but there is no way to cancel it. When you hit the Save button an error message appears saying: "Saving not necessary - no confirmations were created" (Message no. RU441).

Please help.

Thank you.

entry.title: Output Determination for the Maintenance Notifications Mail trigger while in Completed status
entry.content:
Issue Description:

  • Output parameter determination for maintenance notifications is not triggering automatically when the notification reaches the “Completed” stage.

  • Manual generation of the output works successfully.

Configuration Checked:

  • Output types have been reviewed.

  • Output relevance has been verified.

Uncertainty:

  • The Role to be maintained in the Role section of output determination is unclear.

  • Uncertain what the corresponding role should be for maintenance notifications and maintenance orders.

Impact:

  • Automatic triggering not occurring may affect downstream processes that rely on timely output generation.

Next Steps / Requirement:

  • Need guidance on how to correctly define the Role in output determination.

  • Need confirmation of standard practices for automatic output generation in maintenance notifications and orders.

Attached snippets for your refernce.

Output Type :

Receiver 

Channel :

 

Email Settings :

Email Receipiant :

Form template :

Output Parameter Relevance : 

 

Any one kindly share your valuable informations

entry.title: Default Public Layout on Find Maintenance Order
entry.content:
Hi , 

I am setting Public layout for find maintenance order app but same layout is not appearing for other users . Can anyone please let me know how can I configure public layout & default this layout for all users . 

Thanks & Kind Regards 

Mohammed

entry.title: Breakdown analysis for equipment with no start-up date in cloud public
entry.content:
Hello all...

I found that executing the Technical object breakdowns App in S4/Hana public cloud 2508 there are no results when the equipment start-up date is not filled up, also with multiple notifications in differente times. At soon as I put a date in that field in the equipment master data record I can see the results. According to the documentation I found, the report should consider the second notification as the start date of the report when the equipment start-up date is blank. I found the note 3198903 (Notifications not appearing in app "Technical Object Breakdowns" despite having Breakdown checkbox set - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition) and it explains the same. Is there something to configure or to set up to be able to get the analysis without that info? I appreciate any help in this matter.

Thank you,

Javier Gómez

entry.title: Counter Overflow Reading
entry.content:
Hi All ,

I have set counter overflow reading as 99 for a measuring counter . System is allowing to enter measurement reading tp maximum 98 not 99 . As per my understanding , system should allow to enter counter reading upto 99 . Can any one please explain why system is behaving this way ?

Thanking you .

Mohammed

entry.title: Put Component Quantity field as mandatory at Maintenance Order
entry.content:
Hi experts,
In the Maintenance Order, when the user adds a material, I want to make the Quantity field for the component mandatory.
I did the customizing in SAP GUI and now a popup appears, but only in SAP GUI, not in Fiori.

How can I solve this?
Thank you.

entry.title: S/4HANA private Cloud - Assign Employee to maintenance order task
entry.content:
#S/4HANA Private Cloud #Asset Management
Please let me know how I can assign an employee to a maintenance order task. The selection process requires a personnel number as a selection criterion. I previously created a team of employees for a workstation using the "Teams and Responsibilities" app, and I maintained the employee information beforehand. No personnel number is entered there. Can I assign the employees of this team to a maintenance order task? Or what do I need to do to access the personnel number within the task? Is a connection to the HR system necessary?

entry.title: S/4HANA private Cloud - Assign Employee to maintenance order task
entry.content:
#S/4HANA Private Cloud #Asset Management
I'm trying to assign an employee to a maintenance order task. The selection process requires a personnel number as a selection criterion. I previously created a team of employees for a workstation using the "Teams and Responsibilities" app, and I maintained the employee information beforehand. No personnel number is entered there. Can I assign the employees of this team to a maintenance order task? Or what do I need to do to access the personnel number within the task? Is a connection to the HR system necessary?Thanks to all.

entry.title: Implement Pagination technique at CDS level to control DB read volume
entry.content:
• We are facing issue due to large volume of data being fetched at the CDS view level CDS is retrieving the entire dataset at once.
  • C_STSOBJACTIVESTATUSCODETEXT & P_STSOBJATIVESTSMAXPRIORITY 
  • To optimize this, we request your support in applying pagination technique at CDS level.
  • The requirement is to limit the number of records fetched for first GO and when scroll down we can read other some more entries example 20 each time.
  • Please help on this how can we achieve.

entry.title: Generate Proactive Work order with an Automated "In preparation" Phase
entry.content:
SAP Plant Maintenance in SAP Public cloud

Hi Team,

We have a requirement from Client as below. Kindly help us to find path how to fulfill this requirement. 

Requirement: We need the Proactive Work Orders to generate at a subphase of ‘In Preparation’. Our requirement is to generate proactive work order with “In preparation” phase for only certain type of proactive orders like Monthly visual check etc. So, we need to understand the functional setup and how to activate the same using Phase control option (but not limited). If you have any other better options, please propose the same. Hence, check the feasibility/options and advise the way forward. 

Thanks & Regards,

Abhishek Kulkarni

entry.title: Looking for a way to have MARD-LGPBE (Storage Bin) in Fiori app Perform Maintenance job.
entry.content:
I have searched everywhere, but I can not find any information about having Storage Bin (MARD-LGPBE) visible when working with components for Plant Maintenance Orders. For instance when Picking components.
Is there no way to make this possible?
We need to be able to Use Fiori app of some sort, to go and pick the components for an order, and for that we need the Storage Bin to be visible.

Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Best regards.
Per Nielsen

entry.title: API for assigning employee to Work Center (IR02/CR02)?
entry.content:
We are looking for a way to programmatically assign employees to work centers, like you do in CR02/IR02.

The only solutions I could find so far appear very risqué, making use of low-level HR functions to establish the relationship (for example Use functions to create and link objects in HRP1000 and HRP1001 without PPOME | SAPLSMW.com) but nothing released for customer. Obviously a released, clean API would be first prize.

Even for creating the HRP1001 relationship (which I think is what happens when you create these relationships) there appear to be no released APIs.

What are our options? Has anyone done this successfully and - dare I ask - in a manner that is Clean Core compliant?

entry.title: CM25 - Extended planning table: Incorrect column headers
entry.content:
Hello experts,

When executing transaction CM25 and using the extended planning function for user, the 'Period requirements per resource' table that's displayed shows incorrect column headers. These headers should reference either a date or an abbreviation of a weekday. But instead, it shows as follows:

 The columns headers are displayed as an abreviation of the day that the table is obtained. When executed on a friday, the columns are displayed as "VI", short for VIernes, in Spanish. Instead, it should display the planning period, in this case, weekdays, e.g: LU, MA, MI, JU & VI.

Are there any SAP Notes related to this issue? customizing paths to review? any table I should look up to?Thoughts on how to proceed?

Your help will be highly appreciated,

Thanks in advance,

Sebastián
